name: Dungeon S. Plorer
description:
This is a prototype of my first try at making a top-down adventure game. This was heavily inspired by Legend of Zelda a Link to the Past and other games like it. 

You are an adventurer fight through each room in the dungeon with a sword, hammer, and a bow and arrow. Beware of the enemies that live in this dungeon and figure out the puzzles that deter you from getting to the Dungeon Demon.
